SEARCH

Class Keyboard

java.lang.Object
Keyboard
public class Keyboard extends Object
The Keyboard class provides a simple way to read data from the keyboard.

    • getNextInputToken

      private static String getNextInputToken(boolean skip)
      Gets the next token from the input, which may come from the current input line or a subsequent one. The parameter determines if subsequent lines are used.
      Parameters:
      skip - a boolean indicating whether subsequent lines are used
      Returns:
      the next token from the input, which may come from the current input line

      endOfLine method.
      Returns:
